title: august 27: krakatoa!
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the biggest volcanic eruption in recorded history. In the music world, Maia revisits Avril Lavigne’s debut album, and the release of her single “Sk8er Boi.” Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
